content:
There's a new zulip chat for category theory that people here might be interested in:
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/join/f31tmd0bz8zs2lqcgqlsjnsi/
Currently has a lot of interest from the twitter community (and is open to everyone)
If other Zulip chats are anything to go by, you can just dump the junk after the .com
no, that doesn't work, but anyone who is on the server is capable of generating invite emails targeted at specific people (including me; feel free to PM me if you want an invite)
